price: Isheen jireenya keenya addunyaa malee kan biraatii miti, Nuti ni duuna; ni jiraannas, Nuti kaafamoo miti.
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
